alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 05 at 11:41AM PST until December 06 at 6:30PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Siletz River at Siletz affecting Lincoln County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Trask River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. For the Nw Oregon / Sw Washington Coast...including Willapa, Naselle, Vernonia, Covered Bridge near Rosburg, Foss, Tillamook, Tillamook, Beaver, Siletz, Tidewater, Mapleton...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Nehalem River near Foss. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Above 17.0 feet, expect flooding of low lying farm land and structures downstream of the Foss gauging station to Nehalem. Flooding will come close to streets in the town of Nehalem, especially during high tide. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 17.4 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM PST.
